description:
After Illya recieves tickets from Luvia, she heads to a theme park with all her friends! As they play to their hearts content, they end up separated from their guardian, Iri. While looking for Iri, they encounter the nurse, Caren-sensei?! Meanwhile, Illya realizes she`s lost her precious bracelet charm...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: てーまぱーく・ぱにっく!
